definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
The Voice of China, PRC reality talent show

sentences.english: The pity of it is that an intelligent man appears to have been seduced by the sound of his own voice.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，這位智者似乎被自己的聲音誤導了。

sentences.english: Elisa started at the sound of her husband's voice.
sentences.chinese: 聽到丈夫的聲音，伊利莎吃了一驚。

sentences.english: I commanded the voice before terror could incapacitate me.
sentences.chinese: 我趕在恐懼擊倒我以前對那個聲音下令。

sentences.english: Simulations have been made to validate the good separation performance of the algor…
sentences.chinese: 仿真驗證對聲音等非平穩信號具有良好的分離效果。

sentences.english: Don't make any noise while the baby is sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 孩子睡覺時別發出任何聲音。

sentences.english: Exam, only write the pen of the broken broken voice and more or less beating.
sentences.chinese: 考試中，只有寫字筆的碎碎聲音和或多或少的心跳聲。

sentences.english: There are two different sound alerts , which can be set to On or OFF.
sentences.chinese: 有兩種不同的聲音警報，其中可以設置爲開或關。

sentences.english: The voice of the mournful chanter called to dolorous prayer.
sentences.chinese: 哀慟的領唱人的聲音向哀傷的禱告者呼喚。

sentences.english: The whales expired with a rushing sound.
sentences.chinese: 那些鯨魚呼氣時發出一種急促的聲音。

sentences.english: Direct the DSAS's microphone towards the source of sound.
sentences.chinese: 指令員的麥克風對源頭的聲音。

sentences.english: Whoever flees at the sound of terror will fall into a pit;
sentences.chinese: 躲避恐懼聲音的必墜入陷坑。

sentences.english: "I want to hear their voices, " she said. "I hope you're safe.
sentences.chinese: “我想聽到他們的聲音”，她說，“我希望你們平安。

sentences.english: Loud, persistent ringing in the ears, known as tinnitus, can be vexing for its millions of sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 耳朵裏持續嘈雜的聲音使衆多耳鳴患者煩惱不堪。

sentences.english: Only humming a little, the quiet sound in the head.
sentences.chinese: 哼哼小曲，腦子裏有一個輕微的聲音。

definition: (literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
to issue (an order, decree etc)/to send out/to dispatch/to produce (a sound)/to let out (a laugh)
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
